phrases: Right now I am but a worthless defendant.
How could I possibly engage in this matter while the investigation is still ongoing?
Just order me to release Satan's son and turn him into a weapon for the Vatican!
Ooh Mister Arthur, you are so violent
The time for voting is almost over!
Please decide whether you are for or against!
You... heeded the summons because you knew this would happen?
You knew that the son of Satan would lure an army of demons here!
By the way, instead of thinking up schemes should not you be ensuring the Grigori's safety?
I am here to settle things with you, Rin Okumura!
Could you all just shut the hell up?
Do not worry, you will get your turn when I start killing you one by one!
Sir Pheles, I do not care how, just get rid of that demon!
How long are you going to sleep there?
I can hear Rin Okumura's heartbeat.
The same glow as that night.
I am slaying the spawn of Satan.
We will take Sir Pheles' gamble.
Will he become the savior of Assiah,
or a demon king that will bring upon the destruction of everything,
we have no choice but to see for ourselves.
I summoned you all here for a reason.
We have received a notice from the Vatican Headquarters.
So from today on we are officially raising Rin Okumura,
the son of Satan here in the True Cross Academy.
I heard that the fire in the forest the other day
was the result of Okumura going berserk.
I cannot say there is no danger.
However, if he was ever to run berserk again,
we have been ordered to kill him.
Is there a reason why we are in charge of him?
However, I would like to gamble...
On the potential of Rin Okumura.
Do you really believe that my brother can become the savior of Assiah?
To make the Vatican approve of his existence.
We must abide by the two conditions the Grigori has set.
First, make him pass the Exorcist authorization exam.
Second, just to be cautious, someone must keep an eye on him around the clock.
I entrust the latter to you, his little brother, and to Miss Kirigakure.
I fix'd it fer now, but I are not promisin' nuthin''bout the next time.
's reckless to store a demon's heart in the Kurikara.
Whate'r happens,'s outta my terms of guarantee!
's the Demon-Slaying Blade, that was forged to slay the apparitions hauntin' ye olde capital.
Rin, should not you be going?
Blackie, watch the house while I am gone!
Why do we have to do this crap on the last day of the summer break?
Stop whining, and get to work.
Konekomaru, we will manage here, so go and help Moriyama.
Why do not you just rest?
I broke my ribs too, you know.
I almost panicked when there was no one in our usual classroom.
We have to clean up the coal tar?
Why do they make students to do the most tedious jobs?
I do not get a mop?
Do Not Know, look if there is any left over there.
I will go throw out the trash.
He is scared of you, because you are the child of a demon.
You are the son of Satan who butchered many Exorcists all around the world in just one night.
Who knows when your true nature will make you lose control again?
They were piling up in the ceiling!
If you breathe them in your lungs will rot!
Do you want to burn her to death?
My dad, Shima's oldest brother, and Konekomaru's parents were all killed by Satan...
So their families were slaughtered too?
I do not give a damn about what the Vatican thinks of you,
but there is no way in hell we would ever get along with you!
If you hurt anyone close to me, I am going to kill you without hesitation!
Okumura will be having special training from today, so he is coming with me.
The rest of you continue your work.
We are not done talking yet!
Let go of me, you moley four-eyes!
Why do I have to take separate classes?
You do not have any time to spare.
Get ready, because your training will start right away and I expect you to put all your energy into it until the exams.
Your authorization exam is six months away and if you do not pass it...
I know, they will kill me.
I could do it without special training too.
And I have gotten rid of plenty of demons so far!
That was all thanks to your good luck.
You told Suguro to trust you.
You can earn his trust only by showing what you can do.
You have nothing to show, have you?
It is just as the Scaredy Four-Eyes said!
I feel closer to nature like this!
She just did not change from her pajamas...
You have got the blood of Satan in your veins, and I got to say it is damn hot blood.
You managed so far because you have got a lot of potential in you,
but if you cannot freely use the power you were born with,
you are not going to become Exorcist, not to mention Paladin.
What do you want me to do?
Let us see... first line up three of those and light the ones to the sides at the same time.
I told you to light them, not to torch them.
Nope, do not light the middle one.
I said, at the same time.
Do not you think you should start training seriously?
Anyway, do this three times every day, for one hour at a time.
Continue until you can do it while picking your nose.
I am not going to use the sword?
Do you know why you lost yourself in the fight against Amaimon?
That is why the flames take over.
Get used to the flames and build your confidence.
You will train with the Demon-Slaying Blade after that.
It pisses me off, but she is right...
You will get an ulcer if you are always so stressed.
And whose fault do you think that is?
Now, come along with me, Yukio of the Scaredy Four-Eyes.
Long ago we bet our lunches here.
Shura, you should not go all out on a grade schooler!
I am teaching him that fights are never easy!
Hey Scaredy-Eddy, tomorrow's lunch is your treat!
Do not give me foreign-sounding names like that!
You are too easy prey for her, Yukio.
She is so strong and yet she is always fooling around.
I look stupid for taking it seriously!
She could be thinking about a lot of things, even if it does not look like it.
But if I win, you have to stop calling me Scaredy Four-Eyes.
The one who loses focus first on Infinity Mode loses.
They can take down all the balls at that speed?
Just what are they made of?
You just concentrate on showing us what you can do!
You would better concentrate too, Shura.
In the shadow of the pillar in the south end of the room.
He is hiding himself, but you can see him, right?
But he is not watching just Rin, but also you.
The Grigori directly ordered me to watch over Rin -
You have the blood of Satan just like Rin.
From the Vatican's point of view you are just as dangerous.
I do not have the power.
If you really think so, then why the daily check-ups?
Are not you just scared that one day Satan's power will appear in you just like in Rin?
Or the opposite, you want to have the power?
You are wasting your time trying to upset me like this.
But be careful, guys like you are the first to fall to demons.
Is that what pros are like?
It took me all I had to hit just once or twice on beginner mode.
But wait, only your clothes burnt, not your underwear and body!
Does not this mean I have some control?
I will bring some holy water.
For the sake of the teachings of the Buddha
and for the sake of all creation...
Sorry, did I wake you up?
I just had to take a leak.
Try not to wear yourself out...
You are winning already, are not you?
When it comes to pharmacology or chanting the sutras, you are the best in class.
What is the point in having knowledge if I cannot use it in action?
I have to become an Exorcist before him.
Otherwise it would be an offense to your parents.
He saw all that and he still wants to compete with Rin...
Do I really have no talent?
Why are you talking to yourself?
But what are you doing here so early?
I just forgot my pen case here earlier so I came to get it.
What kind of training is that?
I have to light two out of the three candles.
But I totally cannot do it.
Do you remember when the ghoul attacked Paku?
During our training in the dorm?
Back then my familiars turned on me because my heart faltered.
Are not your flames like that too?
If you are not afraid of them, they will obey you.
But why are you telling me this?
Are not you scared of me?
I guess you do not know about it, but demon-human half-breeds are not that unusual.
So you really should not worry about your ancestry.
Just let them talk if they want... to talk...
You really are a nice person!
Do not give me weird nicknames!
I-It is not like I was encouraging you or anything!
I do not get it, Okumura suddenly...
I told you I would kill you without hesitation if you hurt anyone close to me!
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
I will be a bit late.
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
